chunk:
ishonest 401 Dark Circles

Brand: Ishonest

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Coffea Arabica (Green Coffee) Oil

Directions: Every morning and evening, dab and gently press in 2-3 drops using the ring finger on the upper and lower lids. After applying, gently massage the area around the eyes using your fingertip, moving from the outer corner to the inner corner of the eye along the orbital bone, avoiding pulling the skin.

Warnings: Avoid getting the product into the eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Patch test before use. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
